description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: Registration for this event is via an external ticketing system here: [https://ti.to/ascent/bristol-data-science](https://ti.to/ascent/bristol-data-science)

**If you want to speak, please drop us a message on Meetup! We are always looking for speakers from our fantastically awesome community.**

You are invited to the Bristol Data Science meet-up.

Starting at 6 pm - 9 pm. The agenda is as follows;

Food at 6 pm.
6:30 pm Douglas Ashton, Senior Data Scientist, Lightsource Labs.
Topic: Overview of data science in energy and what we're doing in HEMS (home energy management)
7:00 pm George Wright, Founder, Vounder Analytics.
Topic: Time vs. direction - creating 2D plots to prevent office chair dizziness.
7:30 - Elizabeth Brown, Data Scientist, Ascent.
Topic: Building a Film Recommender: Success with a Simple Method
8:00 - Luke Shaw, Samaritans, Senior Data Scientist
Topic: BI and influencing change through data.
8:20 - 9 pm drinks and food.
title: Bristol Data Scientists Meeting
